text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section: "Major project" means an extension, project, or program of water and sewer facilities.

"Major project" includes:
a sewer main at least 15 inches in diameter;
a water main at least 16 inches in diameter; and
a sewage or water pumping station, force main, and storage or other major facility.

"Major project" does not include a sewer main or water main that:
provides only local service;
is 2,000 feet or less; and
is built to avoid unnecessary and uneconomical duplication when a major project is constructed.

text.section: "Program" means a 6-year projected program by the Commission of capital improvements for water and sewer facilities.
